data.text:
Name

Baur, Esperanza Gender: F

Birthname Blanca Rosa Maria Esperanza de Jesús Baur born on 17 July 1920 at 13:00 (= 1:00 PM ) Place Mexico City, Mexico, 19n24, 99w09 Timezone LMT m99w09 (is local mean time) Data source

BC/BR in hand

Rodden Rating AA Collector: Scholfield

Astrology data 24°52' 22°23 Asc. 07°37'

Biography

Mexican actress, nicknamed "Chata", she appeared in a small number of Spanish language films, both in leading and supporting roles. She was the second wife of John Wayne.

Baur and Wayne married on 17 January 1946 in Long Beach, California. Their marriage was rocky and volatile from the start because she was reportedly jealous of his devotion to his work and to his four children; they had no children of their own. Baur accused Wayne of having an affair with Gail Russell, his leading lady in Angel and the Badman, which he denied. Baur was accused of having an affair with hotel heir Nicky Hilton during divorce proceedings. They separated in May 1952, the marriage lasted eight years, coming to an end on 1 November 1954. She died on 10 March 1961 at age 40 in Mexico City.

Link to Wikipedia biography
